articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Watch new NASA sensor measure US air pollution from space in real time (video) - Space.com
articles.description: The TEMPO instrument is the first to monitor air pollution levels across America in real time.
articles.content:
The first images from NASA's new spaceborne air pollution sensor reveal how levels of toxic pollutants change within a day across the United States.

articles.title: One Direction’s Liam Payne postpones tour after ‘serious kidney infection’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Former boy band member say with a ‘heavy heart’ that he has had to postpone his Latin American tour after being hospitalised
articles.content:
The former One Direction member Liam Payne has postponed his Latin American tour after being hospitalized with a serious kidney infection.
